de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.networking

Class DataMapper.SinkOriginFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.networking.DataMapper.SinkOriginFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NetworkDataSink
    Enclosing class:
    DataMapper

    private class DataMapper.SinkOriginFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements NetworkDataSink
    This is a small NetworkDataSink that only forwards data from one origin if the SinkOriginFilter#SinkOriginFilter(NetworkDataSink, NetworkDevice) constructor is used, or all data if the NetworkDevice parameter is null. It allows us to register data sinks for data coming only from a specified SensorType and NetworkDevice.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private NetworkDevice mOrigin
      The network device whose data is accepted, or null if any data should be forwarded
      private NetworkDataSink mSink
      The sink that should receive any data received by this filter

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      SinkOriginFilter(NetworkDataSink sink, NetworkDevice origin)
      Create a new SinkOriginFilter that will only forwardData data stemming from origin

      No implementation necessary

      hashCode implementation that identifies two DataMapper instances as the same if the sink and origin is the same
